data.title: AI Uncovered with Marjo Gazak (Generate Clinical Drafts in Seconds)
data.meta_description: Listen to the third episode of AI Uncovered with Marjo Gazak and Tim Martin discussing drafting clinical drafts in seconds.
data.text:
Generate First Drafts of Clinical Documents in Seconds

In episode three, we are joined by Marjo Gazak. As a life sciences expert, Marjo has over 22 years of experience in drug development, regulatory submissions, document development innovation and data mining systems. In this episode, Tim and Marjo discuss topics ranging from the emergence of automation in the drug delivery process to the future role of generative AI in helping this regulated industry get drugs to market faster. Particularly, Tim and Marjo discuss generating clinical drafts within one second.

Previously, Marjo worked at Eli Lilly. Currently, she is the Senior Director in Regulatory Affairs and Medical Writing at FibroGen. Marjo holds BS and MS degrees in Zoology from Clemson University and a PHD in Aquatic Toxicology from Louisville.

“What used to take 8 hours, I can now generate clinical drafts in one second”

Listen and subscribe to AI Uncovered on all major podcast platforms:

Apple Podcasts

Spotify

Amazon music

About AI Uncovered

AI Uncovered is our new podcast, made for technology enthusiasts by technology experts. Further, it explores the intersection of generative AI, machine learning, and innovation across regulated industries.

With the AI software market projected to reach $14 trillion by 2030, each episode features compelling conversations with different innovators across a variety of industries.

Hosted by Executive VP of Product at Yseop, Tim Martin leads a global team and uses his expertise to manage the wonderful world of product.
